items.title: CDBaby
items.content_html: CDBaby is one of the oldest platforms for independent music distribution, including both digital and physical sales. It offers a range of services including licensing and promotional tools.
items.summary: CDBaby is one of the oldest platforms for independent music distribution, including both digital and physical sales. It offers a range of services including licensing and promotional tools.

items.title: Melodyne
items.content_html: Melodyne is a pitch-correction and audio editing software. It’s widely used for vocal tuning but also offers extensive features for manipulating timing, tempo, and more.
items.summary: Melodyne is a pitch-correction and audio editing software. It’s widely used for vocal tuning but also offers extensive features for manipulating timing, tempo, and more.

items.title: TuneCore
items.content_html: TuneCore is a digital music distribution service that allows artists to distribute their music to various platforms. It offers 100% of sales revenue to the artist and provides detailed sales reports.
items.summary: TuneCore is a digital music distribution service that allows artists to distribute their music to various platforms. It offers 100% of sales revenue to the artist and provides detailed sales reports.

items.title: ReverbNation
items.content_html: ReverbNation offers a range of tools for musicians to promote their music, connect with fans, and distribute their tracks. It also provides analytics and opportunities for live performances.
items.summary: ReverbNation offers a range of tools for musicians to promote their music, connect with fans, and distribute their tracks. It also provides analytics and opportunities for live performances.

items.title: Kompoz
items.content_html: Kompoz allows musicians to collaborate online and create new music. It’s a platform where artists can upload their tracks, find collaborators, and produce songs together remotely.
items.summary: Kompoz allows musicians to collaborate online and create new music. It’s a platform where artists can upload their tracks, find collaborators, and produce songs together remotely.

items.title: Songkick
items.content_html: Songkick is a concert discovery service that allows artists to list their live shows and fans to track their favorite musicians. It integrates with various platforms for ticket sales.
items.summary: Songkick is a concert discovery service that allows artists to list their live shows and fans to track their favorite musicians. It integrates with various platforms for ticket sales.

items.title: Bandcamp
items.content_html: Bandcamp is an online platform that allows artists to sell their music and merchandise directly to fans. It offers a range of customization options and takes a smaller cut compared to traditional distribution platforms.`
items.summary: Bandcamp is an online platform that allows artists to sell their music and merchandise directly to fans. It offers a range of customization options and takes a smaller cut compared to traditional distribution platforms.`

items.title: BeatStars
items.content_html: BeatStars is an online marketplace for beats and instrumentals. Producers can sell or license their tracks to artists, making it easier for musicians to find the right sound for their projects.
items.summary: BeatStars is an online marketplace for beats and instrumentals. Producers can sell or license their tracks to artists, making it easier for musicians to find the right sound for their projects.

items.title: UJAM
items.content_html: UJAM offers a range of software instruments and effects aimed at simplifying the music production process. Their tools are designed to be intuitive and require minimal musical expertise.
items.summary: UJAM offers a range of software instruments and effects aimed at simplifying the music production process. Their tools are designed to be intuitive and require minimal musical expertise.

items.title: Songtrust
items.content_html: Songtrust offers music publishing administration services, helping artists collect royalties from various sources. It aims to simplify music rights management for independent artists.
items.summary: Songtrust offers music publishing administration services, helping artists collect royalties from various sources. It aims to simplify music rights management for independent artists.

items.title: Twitch
items.content_html: Twitch is primarily known as a game streaming platform but has grown to include music and creative content. Musicians can perform live, interact with their audience, and even monetize their streams.
items.summary: Twitch is primarily known as a game streaming platform but has grown to include music and creative content. Musicians can perform live, interact with their audience, and even monetize their streams.

items.title: AudioMack
items.content_html: AudioMack is a music streaming platform geared towards discovery. It allows artists to upload their music for free and offers various promotional tools to reach a wider audience.
items.summary: AudioMack is a music streaming platform geared towards discovery. It allows artists to upload their music for free and offers various promotional tools to reach a wider audience.

items.title: Auphonic
items.content_html: Auphonic is an automatic audio post-production tool for podcasts, interviews, audio books, and more. It helps in optimizing the sound quality of your audio files with minimal manual intervention.
items.summary: Auphonic is an automatic audio post-production tool for podcasts, interviews, audio books, and more. It helps in optimizing the sound quality of your audio files with minimal manual intervention.

items.title: SoundBetter
items.content_html: SoundBetter is a marketplace for music production services. Whether you’re looking for a producer, session musician, or mixing engineer, you can find professionals to help complete your project.
items.summary: SoundBetter is a marketplace for music production services. Whether you’re looking for a producer, session musician, or mixing engineer, you can find professionals to help complete your project.

items.title: Soundtrap
items.content_html: Soundtrap is an online digital audio workstation (DAW) that allows for easy collaboration. It offers a range of built-in loops, instruments, and recording features, making it accessible for both beginners and professionals.
items.summary: Soundtrap is an online digital audio workstation (DAW) that allows for easy collaboration. It offers a range of built-in loops, instruments, and recording features, making it accessible for both beginners and professionals.

items.title: Patreon
items.content_html: Patreon is a membership platform that allows artists to earn revenue through patron subscriptions. It offers various tiers and benefits, enabling artists to build a community of dedicated supporters.
items.summary: Patreon is a membership platform that allows artists to earn revenue through patron subscriptions. It offers various tiers and benefits, enabling artists to build a community of dedicated supporters.

items.title: Splice
items.content_html: Splice is a cloud-based platform offering royalty-free samples, loops, and presets. It also provides collaboration features and a rent-to-own model for music software.
items.summary: Splice is a cloud-based platform offering royalty-free samples, loops, and presets. It also provides collaboration features and a rent-to-own model for music software.

items.title: DistroKid
items.content_html: DistroKid is a music distribution service that allows artists to upload their music to multiple platforms with a single submission. It offers a straightforward royalty payment system and quick distribution times.
items.summary: DistroKid is a music distribution service that allows artists to upload their music to multiple platforms with a single submission. It offers a straightforward royalty payment system and quick distribution times.

items.title: Hypeddit
items.content_html: Hypeddit provides promotional tools to help musicians grow their fanbase on social media and music platforms. It offers features like download gates, fan gates, and chart promotion.
items.summary: Hypeddit provides promotional tools to help musicians grow their fanbase on social media and music platforms. It offers features like download gates, fan gates, and chart promotion.

items.title: JamKazam
items.content_html: JamKazam is an online platform that enables musicians to play music together in real-time from different locations. It aims to minimize latency and offers features like session recording.
items.summary: JamKazam is an online platform that enables musicians to play music together in real-time from different locations. It aims to minimize latency and offers features like session recording.

items.title: Rotor Videos
items.content_html: Rotor Videos is an automated video creation platform for musicians. It allows artists to create music videos, lyric videos, and promotional videos without the need for video editing skills.
items.summary: Rotor Videos is an automated video creation platform for musicians. It allows artists to create music videos, lyric videos, and promotional videos without the need for video editing skills.

items.title: LANDR
items.content_html: LANDR provides automated mastering services using machine learning. It also offers distribution services, allowing artists to publish their music across multiple platforms.
items.summary: LANDR provides automated mastering services using machine learning. It also offers distribution services, allowing artists to publish their music across multiple platforms.

items.title: Drooble
items.content_html: Drooble is a social network for musicians. It offers a platform where artists can share their music, collaborate, and get feedback from a community of like-minded individuals.
items.summary: Drooble is a social network for musicians. It offers a platform where artists can share their music, collaborate, and get feedback from a community of like-minded individuals.

items.title: SubmitHub
items.content_html: SubmitHub is a platform that allows artists to submit their music to blogs, record labels, and influencers. It aims to streamline the music submission process and offers feedback options.
items.summary: SubmitHub is a platform that allows artists to submit their music to blogs, record labels, and influencers. It aims to streamline the music submission process and offers feedback options.

items.title: Vampr
items.content_html: Vampr is a social networking app designed for musicians. It helps artists connect with each other for collaboration, discover opportunities, and build their professional network.
items.summary: Vampr is a social networking app designed for musicians. It helps artists connect with each other for collaboration, discover opportunities, and build their professional network.

items.title: Audius
Catalog
items.content_html:
A new medium for music

Catalog was founded on the principle that music is valuable. We’re a digital record shop and music community for artists, listeners, and collectors. We’re here to actualize a new onchain music system that provides artists with the autonomy and earnings they deserve.
items.summary:
A new medium for music

Catalog was founded on the principle that music is valuable. We’re a digital record shop and music community for artists, listeners, and collectors. We’re here to actualize a new onchain music system that provides artists with the autonomy and earnings they deserve.

items.title: Endlesss Clubs
items.content_html: Clubs are online spaces for music communities to hang out, create together and publish their best work with people who care. They’re also places for businesses to develop authentic relationships with customers and give back to the community.
items.summary: Clubs are online spaces for music communities to hang out, create together and publish their best work with people who care. They’re also places for businesses to develop authentic relationships with customers and give back to the community.

items.title: Supertone
items.content_html:
Supertone’s world’s first singing and acting voice separation and synthesis AI technology is capable of producing hyperrealistic and expressive results. Our proprietary technology is used for the innovation and inspiration of creators around the world.

Supertone is an AI audio tech startup whose mission is to break the limitations in content creation. We are passionate about innovating the content production landscape through our state-of-the-art technology such as expressive singing/speech synthesis, original voice design, and speech enhancement.
items.summary: Supertone’s world’s first singing and acting voice separation and synthesis AI technology is capable of producing hyperrealistic and expressive results. Our proprietary technology is used for the innovation and inspiration of creators around the world.
